verses.name: 2 Chronicles 33:16
verses.text: And he repaired the altar of the Lord, and sacrificed thereon peace offerings and thank offerings, and commanded Judah to serve the Lord God of Israel.

verses.name: 2 Chronicles 33:17
verses.text: Nevertheless the people did sacrifice still in the high places, yet unto the Lord their God only.

verses.name: 2 Chronicles 33:18
verses.text: Now the rest of the acts of Manasseh, and his prayer unto his God, and the words of the seers that spake to him in the name of the Lord God of Israel, behold, they are written in the book of the kings of Israel.
